text: Elected officials have a diverse array of responsibilities and fluid workdays.  We advanced many important initiatives in city building, a satisfying experience.  Workdays could be long or short, depending on meeting schedules. Learned much about issues not previously part of my expertise.  Well managed organization and good cooperation among Mayor and Council ensured a positive culture.
Back stabbing liars cliques boring waste time lazy management is incompetent untrained and utterly stupid work 3.5 hours at most on garbage truck and get paid for eight hours

Many wonderful people, great opportunities for learning, good money.
The staff are friendly and engaged and care about the work they do. The most enjoyable part of the job is meeting new people and learning about different departments.
great place to work if you can get full time . everyone seams to be after that full time spot . management was on the ball good people to work with for sure.
cons: long time to get full time
